writings.text: 下手な鉄砲も数打てば当たる
下手な鉄砲も数撃てば当たる

readings.text: へたなてっぽうもかずうてばあたる

furigana.writing: 下手な鉄砲も数打てば当たる

glossary: even a poor marksman will hit the target with enough shots
even the unskilled can succeed by a fluke given enough tries
